name: Python NumPy Array File
summary: Learn about .NPY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NumPy is a Python programming language library that provides support for large arrays and matrices.
You can export an array to an NPY file by using np.save('filename.npy', array).
You can load an array in an NPY file by using np.load('filename.npy').

description: An NPY file is a NumPy array file created by the Python software package with the NumPy library installed. It contains an array saved in the NumPy (NPY) file format. NPY files store all the information required to reconstruct an array on any computer, which includes dtype and shape information.
